title: Sandro - Eira
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Mediterranean, Middle Eastern, North African, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A Mediterranean restaurant offering a popular vegan brunch every Saturday 10am-4pm, as well as a multi-course vegan feast on the regular menu with several individual meals that can be served vegan. As of May 2015 has one other location.
